channel.title: The Future in Tech
channel.subtitle: Powered by LinkedIn Learning
channel.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos
channel.description: Conversations with leaders building next-generation technology tools.

item.title: EP01-What's Happening in 2023
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos
item.description: Ray Villalobos and Content Managers Natalie Pao and Simon St. Laurent discuss what 2023 holds for the future in technology.

item.title: EP02-What is Generative AI?
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos
item.description: Pinar Demirdag discusses the fundamentals of generative AI, its practical applications, and future developments as companies create AI strategies in 2023.

item.title: EP03-How Generative AI Will Change DevOps
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos
item.description: Jerome Hardaway explores how generative AI can revolutionize software development by increasing efficiency, automating repetitive tasks, and creating more sophisticated and innovative solutions.

item.title: EP04-Building Responsible AI Systems
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos
item.description: Ayodele Odubela, a Data Scientist, Machine Learning professional, and AI Entrepreneur, discusses the ethical issues surrounding the rapid adoption of AI systems, including transparency, minimizing bias, ensuring fairness, and potential ramifications around privacy, security, and governance.

item.title: EP05-Crafting an AI Strategy For Your Business
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos
item.description: Andreas Welsch joins this discussion to share insights on crafting an AI strategy for businesses considering evolving technology, ethics, and legal implications, drawing from his extensive experience in managing stakeholder relationships and leading AI projects across Fortune 500 companies.

item.title: EP06-Tech Innovations to Watch in 2024
item.itunes:author: Ray Villalobos
item.description: Host Amanda Johnson and guest tech analysts Chris Lee and Dana Scott explore the groundbreaking technologies and trends expected to shape 2024.
